item.title: A Product that Gets you Back to Life Faster
item.description:
A Product that Gets you Back to Life Faster

What was the last product to take your breath away? Personally, I have asthma - so that product could easily be a treadmill or even a jacket with a little bit of dog hair on it. But really take my breath away? When prompted with this very question, I stopped to think about how our world today is inundated with products.
